content.html: “Code is read many more times than it is written, make sure to write your code for other humans. If we were writing code just for the computer, we'd be writing binary by hand!” – @ASpittel
content.value:
“Code is read many more times than it is written, make sure to write your code for other humans. 

If we were writing code just for the computer, we'd be writing binary by hand!”

– @ASpittel
